node.title: Police seek driver who injured man, 67, in hit and run
node.description: A 67-year-old man has been seriously injured in a hit and run incident in Palmerston North this afternoon.
node.content:
["A 67-year-old man has been seriously injured in a hit and run incident in Palmerston North this afternoon.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Patrice Allen\n
", "Police say he was crossing Grey Street about 12.30pm when he became involved in an argument with a motorist driving a black Ford Territory.", "They say the 67-year-old then appears to have been deliberately hit by the car, which drove off.", "The vehicle was found in Rangitikei Street a short time later.", "Police are seeking information about the driver."]
